item.name: Average disk read queue length
item.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk Read Queue Length

item.name: Average disk write queue length
item.description: Full counter name: \PhysicalDisk(_Total)\Avg. Disk Write Queue Length

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of file systems of different types as defined in global regular expression "File systems for discovery".

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows for MSSQL:perf_counter["\LogicalDisk({#FSNAME})\Avg. Disk Read Queue Length"].avg(10m)}>20
trigger_prototype.name: Avg. Read Queue Length >20 vol {#FSNAME}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Windows for MSSQL:perf_counter["\LogicalDisk({#FSNAME})\Avg. Disk Write Queue Length"].avg(10m)}>20
trigger_prototype.name: Avg. Write Queue Length >20 vol {#FSNAME}

discovery_rule.name: Network interface discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of network interfaces as defined in global regular expression "Network interfaces for discovery".

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows for MSSQL:vm.memory.size[free].avg(#3)}<({Template OS Windows for MSSQL:vm.memory.size[total].last(0)}*2/100)
trigger.name: Free memory <2%
Lack of free memory on server {HOST.NAME}
Lack of free swap space on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template OS Windows for MSSQL:perf_counter["\Processor(_Total)\% Processor Time"].avg(#3)}>99
trigger.name: Processor load >99%
